template_input_params.description: Operating system image id / template that should be used when creating the virtual image
template_input_params.label: Operating System ID / Template - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02-os_admin_user
template_input_params.description: Name of the admin user account in the virtual machine that will be accessed via SSH
template_input_params.label: Operating System Username - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02-os_password
template_input_params.description: Operating System Password for the Operating System User to access virtual machine
template_input_params.label: Operating system password - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_private_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: Private CAMC SSH key (base64 encoded) used to connect to the virtual guest.
template_input_params.label: Private CAMC SSH key (base64 encoded) used to connect to the virtual guest.

template_input_params.name: ibm_pm_public_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: Public CAMC SSH key value which is used to connect to a guest, used on VMware only.
template_input_params.label: Public CAMC SSH key value which is used to connect to a guest, used on VMware only.

template_input_params.name: WASNode02-name
template_input_params.description: Short hostname of virtual machine
template_input_params.label: Short hostname - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_root_disk_controller_type
template_input_params.description: Type of template disk controller
template_input_params.label: Template Disk Controller - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_root_disk_datastore
template_input_params.description: Data store or storage cluster name for target virtual machine's disks
template_input_params.label: Template Disk Datastore - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_root_disk_type
template_input_params.description: Type of template disk volume
template_input_params.label: Template Disk Type - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_ipv4_gateway
template_input_params.description: IPv4 gateway for vNIC configuration
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Gateway Address - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_ipv4_address
template_input_params.description: IPv4 address for vNIC configuration
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine IP Address - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_memory
template_input_params.description: Memory assigned to the virtual machine in megabytes. This value is required to be an increment of 1024
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Memory - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_ipv4_prefix_length
template_input_params.description: IPv4 prefix length for vNIC configuration. The value must be a number between 8 and 32
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Netmask Prefix - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_number_of_vcpu
template_input_params.description: Number of virtual CPU for the virtual machine, which is required to be a positive Integer
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine vCPUs - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_network_interface_label
template_input_params.description: vSphere port group or network label for virtual machine's vNIC
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine vSphere Port Group - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_version
template_input_params.description: The release and fixpack level of WebSphere Application Server to be installed. Example formats are 8.5.5.12 or 9.0.0.4
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Application Server Version - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_wsadmin_clusters_cluster01_cluster_servers_cluster_server01_server_name
template_input_params.description: Name of the cluster member that will created on each of the nodes
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Cluster member name - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_wsadmin_clusters_cluster01_cluster_name
template_input_params.description: Name of the cluster that will be created
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Cluster name - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_profiles_node_profile_profile
template_input_params.description: Profile name for a custom profile
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Custom Node profile name - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_java_version
template_input_params.description: The Java SDK version that should be installed with the WebSphere Application Server. Example format is 8.0.4.70
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Java SDK version - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_wsadmin_nodeagent_jvmproperty_property_value_maximum
template_input_params.description: Maximum JVM heap size
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Node Agent maximum JVM heap size - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_wsadmin_nodeagent_jvmproperty_property_value_initial
template_input_params.description: Minimum JVM heap size
template_input_params.label: WebSphere Node Agent minimum JVM Heap Size - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_security_admin_user
template_input_params.description: The username for securing the WebSphere adminstrative console
template_input_params.label: WebSphere administrative user name - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_security_admin_user_pwd
template_input_params.description: The password for the WebSphere administrative account
template_input_params.label: WebSphere administrative user password - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_profiles_node_profile_keystorepassword
template_input_params.description: Specifies the password to use on all keystore files created during profile creation
template_input_params.label: WebSphere default keystore password - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_os_users_was_name
template_input_params.description: Operating system userid that will be used to install the product. Userid will be created if it does not exist
template_input_params.label: WebSphere installation userid - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_os_users_was_home
template_input_params.description: Home directory location for operating system user that is used for product installation
template_input_params.label: WebSphere installation userid home directory - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_install_dir
template_input_params.description: The installation root directory for the WebSphere Application Server product binaries
template_input_params.label: WebSphere product installation directory - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_profile_dir
template_input_params.description: The directory path that contains WebSphere Application Server profiles
template_input_params.label: WebSphere profile location - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_os_users_was_ldap_user
template_input_params.description: A flag which indicates whether to create the WebSphere user locally, or utilize an LDAP based user
template_input_params.label: WebSphere to use LDAP for authentication - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_was_os_users_was_gid
template_input_params.description: Operating system group name that will be assigned to the product installation
template_input_params.label: WebSphere user group name - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_cluster
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere cluster to host the virtual machine
template_input_params.label: vSphere Cluster - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_datacenter
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere datacenter for virtual machine creation
template_input_params.label: vSphere Datacenter - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_folder
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere folder for virtual machine
template_input_params.label: vSphere Folder Name - WASNode02

template_input_params.name: WASNode02_adapter_type
template_input_params.description: Network adapter type for vNIC Configuration
template_input_params.label: vSphere Network Adapter Type - WASNode02
